Sample Policy
1. Coverage
Knee surgery is covered under this insurance policy. 2. Pre-Existing Condition Exclusion
Any medical condition for which the insured was aware of prior to the effective date of the
policy is excluded
from coverage for a period of 24 months from the policy start date. 3. Geographic Coverage
Medical treatment is covered under this insurance policy if the treatment is rendered within the
territorial
limits of India. 4. Minimum Policy Duration
The insurance policy must be in effect for a minimum of 30 days from the policy start date to
be eligible for any benefits.
